name: WPC Variation Bulk Editor for WooCommerce
author: WPClever

sections.description:
Variable products are always one of the most crucial parts in creating and managing an online store; so WPC Variation Bulk Editor for WooCommerce was developed to become your assistant in dealing with this. It facilitates users in editing every property of variations in bulk: image, stock, prices (regular and sale prices), backorders, weight, dimension, shipping, and tax classes.

Saving time means more than just working faster on variations, it brings more precision when dealing with heavy workloads and avoiding sales-affecting mistakes. That’s why people tend to prefer tools that help them create and manage multiple things at the same time nowadays – easy, fast, & precise.

Key Features

  • Edit multiple variations at the same time
  • Select specific terms in attribute(s) of variations to bulk edit
  • Change the thumbnail, prices, stock, backorders & low-stock threshold
  • Change the variation’s description, shipping class and tax rate
  • Change the weight, some dimensions (length-width-height) or all at once
  • Work with WPC Product Quantity (min/max/step rules for variations)
  • Work with WPC Countdown Timer (variation-based countdown timers)
  • Work with WPC Variations Table (custom name & image) in displaying custom names/images
  • Work with WPC Variations Radio Buttons in displaying custom name & image
  • Work with WPC Show Single Variations in bulk editing settings for variations
  • Work with WPC Additional Variation Images in adding additional gallery for variations

1-Click Bulk Editing

Users can find the button on top of the variation list in the Variations tab of the variable product page. Click on that then the variation form will be opened for editing right away.

You can see all attributes listed on the top. It’s possible to specify terms that will be configured. By default, if leaving those boxes blank, it means you want to edit all variations at the same time. When you finish, click on the Update button to save the changes.

Widely Compatible with WPC Plugins

When combining with WPC Variation Duplicator for WooCommerce plugin, the manual work will be enormously reduced so users can effortlessly create new variations then edit them in groups. What’s more, the additional gallery for variations added by WPC Additional Variation Images can also be bulk edited for more efficient work.

Outstanding WPC plugins providing variation selector interfaces such as WPC Variations Table (custom name & image), WPC Variations Radio Buttons (custom name & image), WPC Show Single Variations (default/disable/enable/reverse)

For some Premium WPC plugins, users can configure settings at variation level such as WPC Product Quantity (min/max/step rules for variations) and WPC Countdown Timer (variation-based countdown timers).
sections.installation:
1. Please make sure that you installed WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “WPC Variation Bulk Editor”, Install & Activate it
  4. All done! Now you can use the bulk editor when editing the variable product

sections.reviews:
saved a lot of time

By whitetornado_nl on January 6, 2024

50 products and each product has 50 variations in 6 different colors. This saved me a lot of time!!!

Issues with Kadence Blocks

By ian55 on December 31, 2023

I would like to use this plugin, but it has issues with Kadence Blocks. Typical errors are found when editing a post / product. Error message is "Your site doesn’t include support for the 'kadence/rowlayout' block. ". This is typical error for any kadence block type.

Not sure if these errors would invalidate a post / product if I were to update.

Excellent plugin

By vandung93 on July 6, 2023

This one is easy to use also it saved me a lot of time.
